raw_body: PEIRIS – PANSY – Beloved wife of late Freddy Peiris (H.J.F.),​ loving mother of Mohan and Dharini,​ Geethal and Malkanthi,​ Rohith and Nilakshi,​ sister of late Ivy,​ late Sybil,​ Rene and late Mervyn. The remains lie at her residence No. 22/​1,​ Moragasmulla Road,​ Rajagiriya from 10 a.m. on Sunday 13th August. Cortege leaves residence at 3.30 p.m. on Monday 14th August to St. Stephen’s Church,​ Moragasmulla,​ Rajagiriya. No flowers by request.050837
